trans-unit.source: Imports ActiveX controls and generates a wrapper that can be accessed by a designer.
trans-unit.target: 匯入 ActiveX 控制項，並且產生可供設計工具存取的包裝函式。

trans-unit.source: To generate an ActiveX wrapper for an ActiveX control, first create or obtain an instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.AxImporter> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要產生 ActiveX 控制項的 ActiveX 包裝函式，第一次建立或取得的執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.AxImporter>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.AxImporter> constructor accepts an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.AxImporter.Options> object, which sets options for the importer, such as the filename for the wrapper .dll to generate and the output directory to generate the wrapper to.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.AxImporter>建構函式接受<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.AxImporter.Options>物件，該設定匯入工具，例如要產生的包裝函式.dll 和產生的包裝函式的輸出目錄的檔名的選項物件。

trans-unit.source: To generate the ActiveX wrapper, call the appropriate Generate method.
trans-unit.target: 若要產生 ActiveX 包裝函式，呼叫適當的產生方法。

trans-unit.source: To generate from a file, call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.AxImporter.GenerateFromFile%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要從檔案產生，請呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.AxImporter.GenerateFromFile%2A>。

trans-unit.source: To generate from a type library, call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.AxImporter.GenerateFromTypeLibrary%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要產生從類型程式庫，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.AxImporter.GenerateFromTypeLibrary%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The string that is returned will consist of an assembly qualified name (example: "Namespace.Type,Assembly") for the type an ActiveX wrapper was generated for.
trans-unit.target: 所傳回的字串將會包含組件限定名稱 (範例: 「 Namespace.Type,Assembly") 的 ActiveX 包裝函式所產生的類型。

trans-unit.source: The wrapper for the ActiveX control will be generated in the .dll file specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.AxImporter.Options.outputName> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.AxImporter.Options> passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.AxImporter> constructor.
trans-unit.target: ActiveX 控制項包裝函式會產生.dll 檔餇齌中指定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.AxImporter.Options.outputName>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.AxImporter.Options>傳遞至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.AxImporter>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The type can be loaded or queried using <xref:System.Reflection> and treated as an ordinary managed type.
trans-unit.target: 可以載入的型別，或使用查詢<xref:System.Reflection>並視為一般的 managed 型別。

trans-unit.source: You can also call the `GetOcx` method of the type to retrieve a COM interface to the object, if the object supports this.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以呼叫`GetOcx`擷取 COM 介面物件，如果物件支援此類型的方法。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.AxImporter.Options" /> that indicates the options for the ActiveX control importer to use.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.AxImporter.Options" />，表示要讓 ActiveX 控制項匯入工具使用的選項。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.AxImporter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.AxImporter" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the names of the assemblies that are generated for the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得為控制項產生的組件名稱。

trans-unit.source: An array of names of the generated assemblies, or an empty string array if no assemblies have been generated.
trans-unit.target: 產生的組件的名稱陣列；如果未產生任何組件，則為空字串。

trans-unit.source: Gets the names of the source files that were generated.
trans-unit.target: 取得產生的原始程式檔 (Source File) 的名稱。

trans-unit.source: An array of file names of the generated source files, or <see langword="null" /> if none exist.
trans-unit.target: 產生的原始程式檔的檔名陣列；如果沒有原始程式檔，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the attributes for the generated type library.
trans-unit.target: 取得產生的型別程式庫的屬性 (Attribute)。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.TYPELIBATTR" /> that indicates the attributes for the generated type library.
trans-unit.target: 型別 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.TYPELIBATTR" /> 的陣列，表示產生的型別程式庫屬性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.FileInfo" /> indicating the file that contains the control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IO.FileInfo" />，表示包含控制項的檔案。

trans-unit.source: Generates a wrapper for an ActiveX control for use in the design-time environment.
trans-unit.target: 產生 ActiveX 控制項的包裝函式，供在設計階段環境中使用。

trans-unit.source: An assembly qualified name for the type of ActiveX control for which a wrapper was generated.
trans-unit.target: 組件限定名稱，產生 ActiveX 控制項的包裝函式的型別。

trans-unit.source: A type library could not be loaded from <paramref name="file" />.
trans-unit.target: 無法從 <paramref name="file" /> 載入型別程式庫。

trans-unit.source: Generates a wrapper for an ActiveX control for use in the design-time environment.
trans-unit.target: 產生 ActiveX 控制項的包裝函式，供在設計階段環境中使用。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.UCOMITypeLib" /> that indicates the type library to generate the control from.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.UCOMITypeLib" />，表示要產生控制項的來源型別程式庫。

trans-unit.source: Generates a wrapper for an ActiveX control for use in the design-time environment.
trans-unit.target: 產生 ActiveX 控制項的包裝函式，供在設計階段環境中使用。

trans-unit.source: An assembly qualified name for the type of ActiveX control for which a wrapper was generated.
trans-unit.target: 組件限定名稱，產生 ActiveX 控制項的包裝函式的型別。

trans-unit.source: No registered ActiveX control was found in <paramref name="typeLib" />.
trans-unit.target: 在 <paramref name="typeLib" /> 中找不到註冊的 ActiveX 控制項。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.UCOMITypeLib" /> that indicates the type library to generate the control from.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.UCOMITypeLib" />，表示要產生控制項的來源型別程式庫。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> for the control wrapper.
trans-unit.target: 控制項包裝函式的 <see cref="T:System.Guid" />。

trans-unit.source: Generates a wrapper for an ActiveX control for use in the design-time environment.
trans-unit.target: 產生 ActiveX 控制項的包裝函式，供在設計階段環境中使用。

trans-unit.source: An assembly qualified name for the type of ActiveX control for which a wrapper was generated.
trans-unit.target: 組件限定名稱，產生 ActiveX 控制項的包裝函式的型別。

trans-unit.source: No registered ActiveX control was found in <paramref name="typeLib" />.
trans-unit.target: 在 <paramref name="typeLib" /> 中找不到註冊的 ActiveX 控制項。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.TYPELIBATTR" /> that indicates the type library to retrieve the file name of.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.TYPELIBATTR" />，表示要擷取檔名的來源型別程式庫。

trans-unit.source: Gets the path and file name to the specified type library.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定之型別程式庫的路徑和檔名。

trans-unit.source: The path and file name to the specified type library, or <see langword="null" /> if the library could not be located.
trans-unit.target: 至指定的型別程式庫的路徑和檔名；如果找不到程式庫，則為 <see langword="null" />。
